title: 'Boys and Girl - Andy Dalton Signing; Drew Pearson on CeeDee, #88 Legacy; Rookie DE Ron’Dell Carter; Aldon Smith Agent Ron Slavin
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Andy Dalton Signing; Drew Pearson on CeeDee, #88 Legacy; Rookie DE Ron’Dell Carter; Aldon Smith Agent Ron Slavin
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby talk about the signing of Andy Dalton, and what it may mean. Cowboys legend Drew Pearson stops by to discuss the continuing legacy of 88. Jane and Bobby also welcome new rookie Cowboys defensive end Ron’Dell Carter. And NFL agent Ron Slavin drops by to talk about his clients Leighton Vander Esch and Aldon Smith.

Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
